description:
1600 Subscribers! Thank you so much for your support over the last few months. I can't wait to keep bringing you great running videos and some other content in the near future. Have a great day!
👉 Get the free 10 Treadmill Tips guide  https://virtualrunningvideos.ck.page
👉 Support new videos - buy me a coffee :)  https://ko-fi.com/virtualrunningvideos
Gear I use and recommend:
GPS Running Watch: https://geni.us/ZKUMIf
Action Camera: https://geni.us/LlehXxK
Running Shoes: https://geni.us/kilcLA

Welcome to the Virtual Running Videos Channel! On this channel you'll find treadmill running videos, indoor running videos, indoor running, virtual running videos, New Zealand scenery, and virtual run videos. I started this channel out of gratitude for the beautiful place I live and a desire to share that with people. You can experience running and with a virtual run in the beautiful outdoors from the convenience of your home. I hope you enjoy! Please leave a comment, I read every one.

Important Disclaimer: This content is strictly the opinion of myself and is for educational and informational purposes only. It is not intended to provide medical advice or to take the place of medical advice or treatment from a personal physician or health professional. Consult your doctor or qualified health professional regarding specific health questions and before beginning any nutrition, supplement, exercise or lifestyle program. Neither myself nor the publisher of this content takes responsibility for possible health consequences of any person or persons reading or following the information in this educational content. Please take care when exercising. Neither myself nor the publisher of this content take any responsibility for any accident, injury or any health problems which occur while watching this video. As with all exercise programs, when using our videos, you need to use common sense.  Check with your doctor before beginning any fitness program. By performing any fitness exercises, you are performing them at your own risk.  This channel will not be responsible or liable for any injury or harm you sustain as a result of our fitness program, videos, or information contained. Thanks for your understanding.

Links may be affiliate links from which I receive a small commission, but where the price is the same for you. Affiliate links are a way I help offset maintenance and running costs of video production.

Treadmill Workout | Virtual Run Hills | 50 Minutes 4K UHD 60 | GoPro Hero 9 Black Footage
👉 Get the free 10 Treadmill Tips guide  https://virtualrunningvideos.ck.page
👉 Support new videos - buy me a coffee :)  https://ko-fi.com/virtualrunningvideos

This is a virtual run on Otago Peninsula. It's a beautiful sunny summer day, filmed at 4K, 60 frames per second. I Hope you enjoy. Thanks for watching!

Gear I use and recommend:
GPS Running Watch: https://geni.us/ZKUMIf
Action Camera: https://geni.us/LlehXxK
Running Shoes: https://geni.us/kilcLA

180 BPM Running Music Virtual Running Video. 
🎧 Listen while you run 🏃🏻‍♂️
✅👉 Get 2 FREE audiobooks - FREE trial at Audible: https://amzn.to/3gjxQex 👈
I'm working on increasing my cadence to run faster and more efficiently. This virtual run is at 180 beats or steps per minute, with the odd variation. I hope it can help you improve your running cadence.

Gear I use and recommend:
GPS Running Watch: https://geni.us/ZKUMIf
Action Camera: https://geni.us/LlehXxK
